title: As expected, new patch, new problems.
body:
Updates to 6.17.

Client constantly freezes, computer starts freezing, restarts computer.

Client updates again. Everything SEEMS fine.

Starts first match of the day and instantly bugsplats when trying to get into the loading screen. Repeats this about 3 times until the remake happened loses 20lp and gets hit with a queue penalty.

Still waiting on my response to a ticket I filed 5 days ago. 

Rito I can't even..

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons like outdated drivers, bad game files, or even a recent Windows update.  As a first step, disable your [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) if you've recently updated Windows 10.  It's been causing similar issues for players recently!  Once completed, go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide  to get your files and settings fixed up.  This should get you squared away!
